column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The best steakhouse in Chicago...hands down!  Buttery soft melt in your mouth filets.  Oh my!  But if there's one dish you have to try...Try the Bone Marrow.  You have to! Don't let it scare you
column2: when the plate arrives.  It looks a bit greasy and the marrow def has texture. Dig in
column3: scoop some onto that crusty crispy toast and top it with a little mint.  IT. WILL. BLOW. YOU. AWAY!  You're welcome.
